Text: next time u upload something - like an album - make it 1 upload - not 1 upload for each track....thx
shove your spam up your arse, you stupid fucker!

I hope you realise that not only are you making the downloading of your album harder by uploading it track by track, you are also pissing people off because we regard track by track-posting as spam. Fool.
Upload as one file fucking idiot! just see what`s happening when you browse music, your shit is taking up several pages!!!
